amendment.description: To increase certain funding for the Air National Guard, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3796 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To increase certain funding for the Air National Guard, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3796 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
